Docs.summary: The BreakIterator class implements methods for finding the location of boundaries in text.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 Current() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns character index of the text boundary that was most recently returned by next(), next(int), previous(), first(), last(), following(int) or preceding(int).
Docs.returns: The text boundary returned from the above methods, first or last text boundary.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: DONE is returned by previous(), next(), next(int), preceding(int) and following(int) when either the first or last text boundary has been reached.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 First() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns the first boundary.
Docs.returns: The character index of the first text boundary.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 Following(int32 offset) cil managed

Docs.param: the character offset to begin scanning.
Docs.summary: Returns the first boundary following the specified character offset.
Docs.returns: The first boundary after the specified offset or BreakIterator.DONE if the last text boundary is passed in as the offset.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.exception: if the specified offset is less than the first text boundary or greater than the last text boundary.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool IsBoundary(int32 offset) cil managed
abstract member IsBoundary : int -> bool override this.IsBoundary : int -> bool

Docs.summary: Returns true if the specified character offset is a text boundary.
Docs.returns: true if "offset" is a boundary position, false otherwise.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.exception: if the specified offset is less than the first text boundary or greater than the last text boundary.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 Next() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns the boundary following the current boundary.
Docs.returns: The character index of the next text boundary or BreakIterator.DONE if the current boundary is the last text boundary. Equivalent to next(1).

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 Next(int32 n) cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns the boundary following the current boundary.
Docs.returns: The character index of the next text boundary or BreakIterator.DONE if the current boundary is the last text boundary. Equivalent to next(1).

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 Preceding(int32 offset) cil managed
abstract member Preceding : int -> int override this.Preceding : int -> int

Docs.param: the character offset to begin scanning.
Docs.summary: Returns the last boundary preceding the specified character offset.
Docs.returns: The last boundary before the specified offset or BreakIterator.DONE if the first text boundary is passed in as the offset.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.exception: if the specified offset is less than the first text boundary or greater than the last text boundary.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 Previous() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns the boundary preceding the current boundary.
Docs.returns: The character index of the previous text boundary or BreakIterator.DONE if the current boundary is the first text boundary.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.
